channel.title: 0.9.2 Patch Notes
channel.description:
## Illusionist: * Link Minds & Mental Blur are now the Illusionist's night abilities. * Now had Psychic's Misdirect as a second day ability. * Changed type to Social. * Link Minds now has a two second delay at the start where the linked player will be unable to send messages.
## Nightwatch: * Now has the new Follow. (See Observer) * Watch Carefully now reveals a player's class. Has 2 uses.
## Butler & Servant: * Removed Black Wine. * Added Concentrated Wine. The Butler/Servant throws a party at night. No one will be able to whisper the next day. Has 2 uses.
## Observer: * Follow and the old Window Peak have been combined into a new Follow ability. * Window Peak now discovers a player's faction. Has 2 uses.
## Soulcatcher: * Unleash Souls now shows players' classes.
## Bug Fixes: * Aftermath fixed. * Acolyte now properly becomes Cult Leader when they are the only Cult member left. * Chat can now display more than two lines if neccessary. * Fixed the possible bug killing off MM and CL randomly. * People will no longer be able to vote for themselves after the king voting is finished. * Maid Spy is now actually infinite uses. * Targeting panels for abilities with 2 targets have been fixed. * Rejoin message spam has been fixed. * Acolyte kills were appearing as Assaassin kills. * Some others.
## Notes: * Most day abilites are going to get reworked at some point. Going to do them all in one go, instead of doing them as I'm trying to balance individual classes.

item.title: 0.9.2 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
Giving Illusionist Telepathy was badly needed as otherwise if Psychic was converted he was immediately caught. As was removing Visions, as they did not belong in a social class anyway - Psychic often found more scum than Observer.

Before last Patch Psychic was OP, but I think he was very well balanced after it. With this most recent patch playing Psychic will just be infuriating - literally no one will give any info to you in an Unseen game, and Scum have a great excuse not to try and fake claim to you.

I think they should make linked minds a limited use ability on the Illusionist and replace mental blur with a main night ability. As it is Illusionist has gone from by far the best BD role to one of the worst.

item.title: 0.9.2 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Grizzfang
item.description:
Love the link minds and obs changes.

Ellie:

Added Concentrated Wine. The Butler/Servant throws a party at night. No one will be able to whisper the next day. Has 2 uses.

This seems pretty powerful for Unseen and not so much for BD. BD tends to whisper a lot more since Unseen meets at night.

Hippolytus:

I’m all for nerfing Psychic but that utterly destroys him. Why would I ever tell my role or any info to the Psychic who linked minds to me if there is a chance he is Unseen. I think you had it right last patch getting rid of visions and adding Telepathy to Illusionist, bringing Psychic in line with other BD roles.

I like the changes but Psychic needs a new night ability. If unconverted, Psychic seems rather weak right now.
